dct_description_sm: "See reverse for street plans of Twapia, Chifubu, Pamodzi & Kawama." Includes street and other indexes, "Location diagram," and color insigne. Map shows land use, relevant buildings, 3 classes of roads, and railways. ©Zambia Government.
